tab.title: e_text_phrases
tab.openingScript:
thisTab = this:GetTabById(0) local _phrases = StrList() _phrases:Add("[1]
	AHorseman: Oh shit! Here we go again!") _phrases:Add("[2]
	GHero: Are you CJ from San Andreas or something?") _phrases:Add("[3]
	AHorseman: Yes, i am. How did you discover that?") thisTab:UpdateTextListById(0, _phrases)

tab.title: e_text_phrase_properties
tab.openingScript:
local thisTab = this:GetTabById(1) local _followups = StrList() _followups:Add("Successiva") _followups:Add("Conclusione") _followups:Add("Scelta")
thisTab:UpdateComboBoxById(0, _followups, "")

textList.onclickScript: --THIS SCRIPT MUST BE FIXED ACCORDINGLY TO THE NEW ZIP SYSTEM local bodyTab = this:GetTabById(2) _advPath = Editor.GetZipFilePath() _scriptsFolder = _advPath .. "/scripts/" _scriptPath = _scriptsFolder .. this:GetTextListSelectedById(0) bodyTab:SetTextInputMultilineTextById(0, ReadFile(_scriptPath))
